backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing video sessions, segment metadata, status updates, and user-owned session retrieval with validation and session/segment ID tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing frontend files related to Grok provider auto-selection and explicit Demo opt-in handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across components, hooks, providers, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light/dark OKLCH color variables, global styles, and theme-aware CSS tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app orchestrating the multi-step flow for prompt input, clip generation, composition, and download with provider and session hooks.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper with themed header, footer, background image, and global page structure.
Bottom fixed action bar rendering a single adaptive CTA button with loading and variant support.
frontend/src/components/ClipSegmentsList: Displays per-clip generation progress, statuses, icons, and retry actions with overall progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/ComposedVideoPre: Handles video composition flow, showing progress, errors, and final preview with download support.
frontend/src/components/ErrorNotice.tsx: Displays an error alert with optional retry and start-over actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileStepper.ts: Renders a mobile-friendly step indicator for prompt, clips, compose, and download stages.
frontend/src/components/PromptComposer.t: UI for entering prompts, durations, reference images, and provider settings, including Grok runtime configuration.
frontend/src/components/ReferenceImageUp: Manages uploading, validating, previewing, and removing reference images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching a session and user sessions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Stores and toggles light/dark theme with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoProvider.ts: React hook managing current video provider selection, syncing with Grok configuration changes and handling provider updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSession.ts: Manages video generation sessions, handling segment creation, clip generation, status updates, and retries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, dark mode, typography, and mobile-safe UI adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/duration.ts: Utility functions for validating durations, suggesting clip settings, and splitting durations across clips.
frontend/src/lib/fileEncoding.ts: Encodes image files to base64 for API requests and provides helpers for batch encoding.
frontend/src/lib/grokRuntimeConfig.ts: Handles loading, saving, validating, and subscribing to runtime Grok API configuration stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/referenceImages.ts: Utilities for validating, formatting, and previewing reference image files with size/type constraints.
frontend/src/lib/videoCompose.ts: Provides basic browser‑based video composition simulation and a helper for downloading videos.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/providers/grokProvider.ts: Implements Grok API integration for deriving segments and generating clips, supporting env and runtime config.
frontend/src/providers/videoProvider.ts: Manages selecting between Grok and demo video providers using config and localStorage, including explicit demo opt‑in logic and persistence rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, spacing, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, goals, architectural notes, known issues, and implemented features for the Grok-powered video generation app.
